title: Regional Marketing Manager, Northern Europe
content:
We’re UserTesting, a leader in experience research and insights; we believe the path to human understanding and great experiences start with a shared understanding—seeing and hearing how another person engages with the world around them and taking in their perspective. Working at UserTesting, you will be empowered to help organizations  discover the human side of business–transforming how they work, collaborate, innovate, and bring new products and experiences to market. This is what inspires us, and it’s how we enable companies to connect with their audiences naturally and organically through an experience that is uniquely, and intentionally human. 
A trusted company by top brands for 15+ years, UserTesting, recently merged with UserZoom, has over 3,400 customers in 50 countries, including 75 of the Fortune 100 companies. Joining our team means being part of a passionate group focused on transforming how companies learn from and understand their customers. Come join us and help us build the engine for human understanding.The Opportunity:
UserTesting is seeking Regional Marketing Manager to lead its marketing efforts in Northern Europe.  This position reports into the VP Marketing, EMEA & APAC. 
UserTesting first opened our European headquarters in Edinburgh, Scotland in 2019 and has been growing rapidly ever since. We are looking for an experienced B2B software regional marketing manager that is comfortable partnering with Sales to help us drive business growth in EMEA with a focus on Northern Europe.
Responsibilities:

Own the regional KPI’s and results, tracking end-to-end from budget spend through to pipeline generated and deals won. Use the data and learnings to improve and optimise performance continuously.
Develop a regional marketing strategy and quarterly plans, in close partnership with Sales, SDR’s, Customer Success, and Global Marketing teams.
Own the regional Sales/Marketing relationship, ensuring flawless communication and execution. Partner with Sales, SDR’s and BDR’s to develop marketing programs and processes that both fit the needs of the region, and align with our Global marketing direction.
Own & execute holistic regional marketing programs that engage our target audience and achieve regional goals, including tactics such as trade shows, hosted events & webinars, email, content syndication / 3rd party media & sponsorship.
Partner with our Demand Center teams and Media agency to execute digital tactics such as Paid Social, SEM / SEO, and web localisation.
Partner with product marketing, corporate marketing, researchers, and a wide variety of internal & external thought-leaders to develop region-relevant content that engages and attracts new customers, such as customer stories / case studies, blogs, ebooks, guides, PR, etc.
Engage with partners and our partner organization and create opportunities to work together to expand the reach and impact of our campaigns.

 
What we are looking for:

Experience in a Regional Marketing / Field Marketing role in a SaaS Enterprise B2B Organisation
Highly collaborative & strong communicator
Experience building programs in Marketo, and managing leads, campaigns, & reporting in Salesforce.
Acute attention to detail
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced work environment with quick turnarounds and timelines
To learn more about our team, culture, and customers, check out our careers page, company blog, and press/awards. Aside from a great work environment and the opportunity to make an impact, we’re also growing the team quickly–join us!
At UserTesting, we are committed to providing more inclusive and accessible experiences for our candidates. We pride ourselves on building empathy; diverse perspectives, which we believe are the key values to creating exceptional experiences for everyone. Our commitment to providing accessible experiences is driven by this belief and our core values. If you require any accommodations or have any specific requests about how we could tailor our interview process to better suit your needs please contact us on: talentexperience@usertesting.com. If you need to speak to someone please ask!
******
UserTesting is an Equal Opportunity Employer and a participant in the U.S. Federal E-Verify program.  Women, minorities, individuals with disabilities and protected veterans are encouraged to apply.  We welcome people of different backgrounds, experiences, abilities and perspectives.  
UserTesting will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, as applicable.  
We welcome candidates with physical, mental, and/or neurological disabilities. If you require assistance applying for an open position, or need accommodation during the recruiting process due to a disability, please submit a request to People Operations by emailing askPeopleOps@usertesting.com.
